Project_Name: iOS Mobile App Dev & Backend Dev for Vet Platform
Project_Summary: Diffco built two iOS mobile apps for a pet healthcare platform, for vets and pets parents. Its features include examination forms, reminders, and more. They also developed the client's backend.
Review: "Their extensive technical knowledge and expertise in mobile app development were very impressive."

Project_Name: Community Online Platform for Aviation Tech Company
Project_Summary: Diffco created an online platform for an aviation tech company. The team developed the web-based application, ERP, and backend. This solution allows end-users to book, schedule, pay, and more.
Review: "We were impressed by their market knowledge and product development skills."

Project_Name: Mobile App Development for Law Enforcer Mobile Ecosystem
Project_Summary: A mobile eco-system for law enforcement partnered with Diffco in order to develop several mobile apps including a field sobriety test, a field investigation card, and pill detection test.
Review: "While working with Diffco, I felt like they were a part of our own team."

Project_Name: Web Dev & ERP Platform for Entertainment Company
Project_Summary: Diffco provided website and custom software development for an entertainment company. The team handled the integration of an ERP platform that includes a booking system and more business monitoring features.
Review: "The solutions they developed work very well and are exactly what we were looking for."

Project_Name: Mobile SDK Development for AI Voice Platform
Project_Summary: An AI voice platform needed to develop a mobile partner SDK and hired Diffco to provide the necessary services. The goal was to make it easier for clients to integrate the platform into their products.
Review: "We were impressed by Diffco's approach to the development process and how they engineer new solutions."

Project_Name: Digital Content Distribution Platform for Software Company
Project_Summary: A software development, consultancy, and integration company needed to develop backend software for a digital content distribution platform for a client. They hired Diffco to provide the necessary services.
Review: "They have a perfectly organized business process and high-quality standards."

Project_Name: Mobile App Dev for AI-Enhanced Mobile Application
Project_Summary: Diffco provided mobile app development for an AI-enhanced mobile application for foodies. The team created an MVP project to help the company with its launch.
Review: "Diffco team is always ready to help; they share their ideas and suggest solutions of how to solve your task."

Project_Name: Data Source Integration for MLOps Platform
Project_Summary: Diffco provided custom software development for an MLOps platform. The team built integration of modules for the client which required various AI APIs.
Review: "They provided us with many valuable feedback on how to improve our product development strategy."

Project_Name: App Dev for Electrical & Electronic Manufacturing Company
Project_Summary: Diffco developed an iOS and Android app prototype that decodes audio signals from TV, allowing users to hear any TV within one network area on headphones. They also developed a Shopify website.
Review: "They address issues quickly and communicate the outcomes to our team, resolving them if needed."

Project_Name: Technical Development for Gaming Community-Driven Mobile App
Project_Summary: Diffco is developing a gaming firm's technical infrastructure from scratch, building a customized blockchain solution and an admin panel. They use numerous frameworks for mobile and web development.
Review: "They did a very good job at management."

Project_Name: Back-end App Development for Digital Development Agency
Project_Summary: Diffco US provided back-end development services, analytics, security checks, and upgrades for the client’s existing architecture as they created their mobile app.
Review: "There was confidence that we don't need to be triple check their work. We never had to redo anything. Diffco US is very reliable."
